text: The Shine muscat, also known as Vitis vinifera, is part of a variety of grapes. It is grown in parts of South Korea and Japan. It carries a strong aroma and can be identified through its distinct mango-like taste. However, this fruit is expensive due to its sweet and enjoyable taste. Shine muscat can also be used to make Wine. Vitis vinifera is similar but not the same. Category:Fruits Category:Vitaceae
title: Vitis vinifera
